title: Dalysian Hope
description: A young girl. An ancient war. Secrets and lies around every corner. Who will you trust?Sophie Evans never expected to have two strangers break into her apartment. When it happens the same night ancient monsters try to kill her, she knows these two have to be connected. Taken to a safe place by a group of people she didn’t even know existed, Sophie quickly learns her life isn’t what she thought it would be.Thrust into a world of lies, deceit, and ancient magic, Sophie needs to figure out who is her friend—and who wants her dead. An ancient war is raging and Sophie is the only one who can fight for the people, but is she willing to take the risk or will she cower and crumble under the pressure?The first installment of the Dalysia trilogy is the perfect mix for fans of Percy Jackson and the Hunger Games. Get lost in the magic today.
author: Jamie Summer
